issue.title: Waters mzml fails due to ambiguity of array type labels

content.raw:
I received the data from Waters. They make mass spectrometers, and have a glycomics workflow described in [this poster](http://www.waters.com/webassets/cms/library/docs/2015asms_qing_yu_glycan.pdf). I'll check with the provider to see if they are willing to let me upload it here, or send you a private copy to run tests on. I'm not sure their file is standards compliant. 

I did something similar for an mzIdentML issue from another commercial vendor but I wasn't sure you wanted that workaround in the code base, but I saw you added the same feature last patch, so I thought I'd post this.
content.html:
I received the data from Waters. They make mass spectrometers, and have a glycomics workflow described in this poster. I'll check with the provider to see if they are willing to let me upload it here, or send you a private copy to run tests on. I'm not sure their file is standards compliant.

I did something similar for an mzIdentML issue from another commercial vendor but I wasn't sure you wanted that workaround in the code base, but I saw you added the same feature last patch, so I thought I'd post this.
